name: Bird Idle Cafe
description:
==Mini Jam 99 Submission==

Birds Working Towards 5 Stars

You have the privilege of working amongst your fellow bird people to open up a brand new cafe! Your local review app, Belp, will not register your cafe until you reach 5 star quality! Looks like you guys have to work non-stop till you get there!

Gameplay

  1. Gather coffee  beans by clicking the top left icon or you could just idle (but you probably should click away, it'll be helpful)
  2.  Hover over the various tools and click on either the clock (to decrease wait time for coffee) or medal (increase quality of coffee to earn more money)
  3. You have to make at least 20 drinks, upgrade once or twice for all machines to earn a star. You could also buy a star on the left!
  4. If you don't know what you're doing, just keep clicking around till you earn stars honestly
  5. The game currently doesn't end so it's endless clicker (save your  fingers if you're tired)

Controls

Left Mouse Button - Interact

Tools Used

Godot

Inkscape

Reaper

Credits

This is a solo entry

Fun Stuff To Know:

The bird's names are as follows:

Blue bird - Jack

Yellow bird - Jan

Pink bird - Lilly

Additional Notes

- Obviously not finished yet but feedback is always welcome!

- The game currently on works on PC! Did not have enough time to implement touch screen functionality!

- There are unfortunate cracklings and pops with the audio. Godot seems to have known audio bugs for web exports! I hope you can enjoy the music nonetheless.

- General optimizations have sort of been neglected so I apologize if have there are lag spikes or lag (especially with the HTML build)
